def has_plug(computer:item):
    # Determine if the computer has a plug
    symbol plug_available=exists plug: item : is_powersocket(plug) and close(plug, computer)
    return plug_available

behavior turn_on_computer(computer:item):
    body:
        if has_plug(computer):
            # Check if the computer is connected to a power source
            bind plug: item where:
                is_powersocket(plug) and close(plug, computer)
            achieve_once plugged(computer)
        # Use achieve_once since checking for plug and switching on are temporary goals
        if not is_on(computer):
            achieve is_on(computer)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind home_office: item where:
            is_home_office(home_office)
        bind home_office_computer: item where:
            is_computer(home_office_computer) and inside(home_office_computer, home_office)
        # Select the computer located inside the home office
        turn_on_computer(home_office_computer)  # Turn on the computer
